item.title: How to Fix AdSense Ad Serving Limits the right way
item.description: Ads serving limits has been an agony most AdSense publishers face when they get fraudulent or bad ads experiences on their websites. Google AdSense (other Ads Networks) has been fighting invalid traffic and invalid ad clicks for years to protect both the advertiser and publisher from bad ads experiences.
item.content:encoded: Ads serving limits has been an agony most AdSense publishers face when they get fraudulent or bad ads experiences on their websites. Google AdSense (other Ads Networks) has been fighting invalid traffic and invalid ad clicks for years to protect both the advertiser and publisher from bad ads experiences.
item.author: contact@wpcodevo.com (Ziddah Edem)

item.title: Best Monitors for Programming and Coding: Top 5 Options
item.description: Picking the right monitor for programming isn’t as easy as everyone thinks. It takes time, patience, plus hours and hours of research. Luckily for you, it’s my job to do that for you. Programmers spend most of their time on a computer planning, designing, writing, and testing code. In the world of coding, a monitor is like a spectacle - You can’t do much without it.

item.title: Best Keyboard for programming & coding: top 5 options 2021
item.description: Programmers spend most of their time on a computer planning, designing, writing, and testing code. In the world of coding a keyboard is like a walking stick when blind - You can’t do much without it. For most programmers, having a good keyboard can significantly improve workflow. Spending countless hours typing requires a keyboard that's comfortable to type on, switches that feel light and responsive, and features such as mechanical and programmable keys
item.content:encoded: Programmers spend most of their time on a computer planning, designing, writing, and testing code. In the world of coding a keyboard is like a walking stick when blind - You can’t do much without it. For most programmers, having a good keyboard can significantly improve workflow. Spending countless hours typing requires a keyboard that's comfortable to type on, switches that feel light and responsive, and features such as mechanical and programmable keys
item.author: contact@wpcodevo.com (Ziddah Edem)

item.title: HostGator Reviews: Expert Opinion
item.description: HostGator might be one of the biggest, oldest web hosting companies in the industry, but they’re still offering 99.9% uptime guarantee, a free SSL certificate, easy WordPress installs, and a free domain for a year. I consider them the best web hosting for businesses. They offer 62% off discount, a free domain name, and a free SSL certificate.
item.content:encoded: HostGator might be one of the biggest, oldest web hosting companies in the industry, but they’re still offering 99.9% uptime guarantee, a free SSL certificate, easy WordPress installs, and a free domain for a year. I consider them the best web hosting for businesses. They offer 62% off discount, a free domain name, and a free SSL certificate.
item.author: contact@wpcodevo.com (Ziddah Edem)

item.title: Hostinger Review: Expert Opinion
item.description: Hostinger is one of the most inexpensive shared hosting providers on the market today with prices starting at $1.39 per month. All of their plans come with a 30-day money-back guarantee and a free website builder. In fact, the Hostinger platform boasts 29 million users across 178 different countries. There is no doubt that Hostinger ranked first for the best cheap web hosting plans.
item.content:encoded: Hostinger is one of the most inexpensive shared hosting providers on the market today with prices starting at $1.39 per month.
